sense.gloss: recollecting, reminiscing, looking back, retrospection, review
to look back on (the past), to reflect on, to reminisce about
to look behind (at), to turn round (and look), to look over one's shoulder
to consider, to concern oneself about, to take notice of, to pay attention to, to take into consideration
slightest notice, slightest consideration, slightest attention, a little thought, glance

r_ele.r: かていをかえりみない

sense.gloss: showing (someone) special courtesy (to persuade them to take a post)
inability to make up one's mind due to worrying about how others will think, hesitation, wavering, vacillation
looking everywhere, looking in all four directions
looking right and left or all about, vacillation
legal adviser, legal advisor, corporation lawyer, family lawyer
look carefully where your own footsteps fall, seek enlightenment by knowing yourself and not by watching others, know thyself
